|cpu1chip1 = Ralink;RT3050; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 320 <!-- 320 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC test report lists the following additional models as covered by this FCC ID.. *PS-1210Un *PS-1210MFn *UN-S1210N *NS-1500N *3G-6200nL *GP-110UN *GP-110MFN *GUN-210N *GNS-G1500 *3G-200nL *PLANET FPS-1012N *ASSMANN DN-13014-2
FCC photos show the device with a 2MB Flash chip.
Per the manual, the default SSID is '''edimax'''.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=148974 On the DD-WRT forums]
